Slots¶

Slots¶

class games.slots.game.slots.Slots(session_id)¶
dict_representation() → dict¶

Returns the current status of a players slots session

Returns

Dictionary representation of the game

play_slots() → dict¶

A round of slots is played.

Returns

A dictionary containing the displayed slots and payout of the player

record_bet(user: accounts.models.CustomUser) → None¶

Records the players bet and subtracts from the user balance

Parameters

user – the current player

set_multiplier()¶

Sets the multiplier by following a highly skewed distribution The multipliers have the following probabilities of being chosen: 1 = .75%, 2 = .15%, 3 = .07%, 4 = .02%, 5 = .01%

Slots¶

Consumers¶

class games.slots.web.consumers.SlotsConsumer(*args, **kwargs)¶

Web socket consumer for slots game

connect()¶

Handles connecting a user to game channel and registering them for the session when a user connects to the web socket

disconnect(code)¶

Handles removing a user from the game channel and removing them from the session when a player navigates away from the game web page

Parameters

code – exit code

class games.slots.web.consumers.SlotsUpdater¶

Game Updater for Slots

static load_game(request_data: dict) → dict¶

Returns the full dictionary representation of the slots game. This is what is sent to front-end

Parameters

Returns

dictionary representation of the slots game
